Package com.filefixer

Class ZipFolder

java.lang.Object
com.filefixer.ZipFolder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ZipFolderInterface
public class ZipFolder extends Object implements ZipFolderInterface
This class handles the extraction of a ZIP folder's contents.
